patthana15.35:4.1: Sāsavañceva no ca āsavaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naāsavo ceva naanāsavo ca nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana15.35:5.1: Āsavañceva sāsavañca akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca noāsavo ceva naanāsavo ca naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā ….
patthana15.35:6.1: Sāsavañceva no ca āsavaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paccayā naanāsavo ceva nano ca āsavo naabyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā ….
